title: Hacked
body: Hello all, so my main (which was G3Ultimatum) got hacked. The hacker changed all the passwords including my email password, but apart from that nothing much. I already sent a ticket to Riot and it has been about 3 days now. I was wondering how long it usually takes for riot to help get my account back, and if it is at all possible for them to retrieve it? I am really nervous and honestly I hate having to play on this account because it's level 7 lol.

replies.body: Don't be nervous, our account team may be able to help out and you'll be in good hands!  I looked into this for you and see that a specialist is already chatting with your issue through your ticket.  Please reply to the ticket when possible, and they can help get this sorted out.  Thanks for your patience!
